players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso, based on my investigation. I will work with Alice to gather more evidence and protect the villagers."
You: "I think Charlie might be the mafioso. I'll keep an eye on him and try to gather more evidence."
Charlie: "Charlie is the mafioso, and I will continue to investigate his actions. Let's work together to ensure the safety of the village."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
